ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2017 - Present  Lead analyst responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Developed and implemented risk assessment frameworks, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. Key Achievements :   Developed a comprehensive training program for new analysts, improving overall team performance.  Conducted complex investigations into high-risk clients, successfully mitigating significant financial crime risks.  Implemented new risk assessment tools that increased the accuracy and efficiency of due diligence processes.  Santander UK PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2017  Conducted enhanced due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure adherence to AML regulations.  Key Responsibilities :   Performed detailed due diligence on high-risk clients, identifying potential financial crime risks.  Prepared comprehensive risk assessment reports for senior management.  Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Monitored client transactions for suspicious activities and potential risks.  HSBC Bank AML Compliance Analyst  Manchester, UK  2011 - 2013  Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying and mitigating potential AML risks.  Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.  Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.  Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

JobProfile.Title: Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Lead analyst responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Developed and implemented risk assessment frameworks, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Developed a comprehensive training program for new analysts, improving overall team performance. 
 Conducted complex investigations into high-risk clients, successfully mitigating significant financial crime risks. 
 Implemented new risk assessment tools that increased the accuracy and efficiency of due diligence processes.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Conducted enhanced due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure adherence to AML regulations. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Performed detailed due diligence on high-risk clients, identifying potential financial crime risks. 
 Prepared comprehensive risk assessment reports for senior management. 
 Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures. 
 Monitored client transactions for suspicious activities and potential risks.

Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying and mitigating potential AML risks. 
 Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes. 
 Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory authorities. 
 Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced PEP & High Risk Analyst with over 12 years in the banking industry. Expertise in conducting comprehensive due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Adept at identifying financial crime risks and implementing effective mitigation strategies.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: David has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors. The candidate has been working as a Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst at NatWest Group for the last 7.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, David holds a Low Management Level position, as Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst at NatWest Group. from 01/01/2017 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 7.7 years in this company.
